name: Invite Me In
storyline: Walking home alone one night, you meet an injured stranger in need of help. So you do what you’d hope anyone else would do for you in that situation… you invite him in…
summary: This is a horror visual novel with elements of action, thriller, and romance depending on how you play. Choices are the key to deciding how this night ends.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Walking Home Alone One Night You Meet an Injured Stranger in Need of Help - Invite Me In
